subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Andrés Romero of Argentina won the Zurich Classic in his 12th career start on the PGA Tour, closing with a four-under 68 on Sunday for a one-stroke victory over Peter Lonard of Australia.
snippet: Andrés Romero of Argentina won the Zurich Classic in his 12th career start on the PGA Tour, closing with a four-under 68 on Sunday for a one-stroke victory over Peter Lonard of Australia.
